response.overview: As per usual, emo kid Frankie Stein gets chased by their peers who relentlessly bully Frankie for being different. This time something unusual happens: Frankie stumbles upon an abandoned Gothic estate and decides to take refuge there. But what appears to be a haunted castle turns out to be inhabited by a peculiar group of beautiful, monstrous outcasts: the anti-family. A group of monstrous queer outcasts who live there in their own created world with their own rules. Within the safe walls of the castle, Frankie learns what it means to embrace yourself, no matter how strange you might be.
response.title: The Anti Family
